premium.description: Check the current premium status of this server.

settings.description: Change the settings of this server.

colors.description: Change the default colors of this server.

embeds.description: Change the default colors of embeds.

buttons.description: Change the default colors of buttons.

choices.remove_votes_on_ban: Remove active votes when a user is banned
choices.remove_votes_on_kick: Remove active votes when a user is kicked
choices.remove_votes_on_leave: Remove active votes when a user leaves

status.description: To which status should the setting be changed?

emojis.description: Change the default emojis of this server.

language.description: Change the language of this server.

choices.create_thread_with_poll: Create a thread when a new poll is created
choices.lock_and_unlock_thread_with_poll: Lock/unlock a thread when the related poll is closed/reopened

status.description: To which status should the setting be changed?

page_number.label: Page number
page_number.placeholder: Please enter the page number you want to go to...

success.title: Poll created
success.description: The poll has been successfully created.

participants.title: Participants
participants.votes: Users who voted for this option:
participants.no_votes: No user has voted for this option.

select.placeholder: Select an option to see the participants...

added.title: Vote added
added.description: You have successfully voted for the option {{option}}.

added_selected.title: Votes added
added_selected.description1: You have successfully voted for the following options:

removed.title: Vote removed
removed.description: You have successfully removed your vote for the option {{option}}.

removed_selected.title: Votes removed
removed_selected.description: You have successfully removed your votes for the following options:

removed_all.title: All votes removed
removed_all.description: You have successfully removed all your votes for this poll.

manage.title: Manage your votes
manage.description: You can remove your votes from the poll by selecting the options below.

select.placeholder: Select one or more options to remove your votes...

confirm.title: Close poll
confirm.description1: Are you sure you want to close this poll?

success.title: Poll closed
success.description: The poll has been successfully closed.
success.error: However, the original message could not be updated.
success.error_missingaccess: However, the original message could not be updated because the bot does not have the permissions to access the channel.
success.error_unknownchannel: However, the original message could not be updated because the channel could not be found.
success.error_unknownmessage: However, the original message could not be updated because the message could not be found.

confirm.title: Delete poll
confirm.description1: Are you sure you want to delete the this poll permanently?

success.title: Poll deleted
success.description: The poll has been successfully deleted.
success.error: However, the original message could not be deleted.
success.error_missingaccess: However, the original message could not be deleted because the bot does not have the permissions to access the channel.
success.error_unknownchannel: However, the original message could not be deleted because the channel could not be found.
success.error_unknownmessage: However, the original message could not be deleted because the message could not be found.

export.title: Export poll
export.description:
You can export the poll to a file and use it outside of the bot.
Please select the format you want to export the poll.

success.title: Poll exported
success.description:
The poll has been successfully exported and is attached to this message.
You can now download the attached file and use it outside of the bot.

confirm.title: Poll result published
confirm.description: The poll result has been successfully published in {{- channel}}.

confirm.title: Reopen poll
confirm.description1: Are you sure you want to reopen this poll?

success.title: Poll reopened
success.description: The poll has been successfully reopened.

debug.content: If you need help from our support team, please share the following link with them:

success.title: Invite EasyPoll to your server!
success.description: Click the button below to invite EasyPoll to your server.

no_premium.title: This server does not have premium!
no_premium.description: Get premium to unlock more features!

change.title: Change language
change.text:
Here you can change the language of the bot on this server.

Please select a language for the bot on this server:

changed.title: Language changed
changed.description: The language of the bot on this server has been changed to {{- language}}.

default.title: Task failed successfully!
default.description:
An error has occured but I'm unable to tell you why.
Please ask the support for more help.

guild_command.title: Server command!
guild_command.description: This command can only be used in servers.

missing_bot_permissions.title: Missing permissions!
missing_bot_permissions.description1: The bot is missing the following permissions:
missing_bot_permissions.description2: Please make sure the bot has all the required permissions.

missing_user_permissions.title: Missing permissions!
missing_user_permissions.description1: You are missing the following permissions:
missing_user_permissions.description2: You cannot perform this action without the required permissions.

premium_required.title: Premium required!
premium_required.description: This feature is only available for premium servers. Please get premium to use this feature.

invalid_channel_type.title: Invalid channel type!
invalid_channel_type.description: The selected channel is not a allowed channel type for this action.

invalid_color.title: Invalid color!
invalid_color.description: The entered color is invalid. Please make sure the color is in the correct format.

invalid_page.title: Invalid page!
invalid_page.description: The entered page number is invalid. Please make sure the page number is in the correct format and within the valid range.

invalid_time.title: Invalid time!
invalid_time.description: The entered time is invalid. Please make sure the time is in the correct format.

max_time.title: Maximum time reached!
max_time.description:
You have reached the maximum time of {{maxtime}}.
Please make sure the entered time is not longer than the maximum allowed time.
max_time.description_upgrade: You can increase the maximum time to {{maxtime}} by upgrading to premium.

unknown_emoji.title: Unknown emoji!
unknown_emoji.description:
You have specified an unknown emoji!
You can only use emojis from servers where EasyPoll is invited. Please make sure {{- emoji}} is an **official Discord** emoji or an emoji **from this server**.

restricted.title: You cannot perform this action!
restricted.description: You or this server is restricted from using this action.
restricted.description_user: You are restricted from using this action.
restricted.description_guild: This server is restricted from using this action.

already_voted.title: Already voted for this option!
already_voted.description: You have already voted for this option and cannot vote again for the same option.

max_choices_reached.title: Reached the maximum number of choices!
max_choices_reached.description: You have reached the maximum number of choices for this poll. You can remove some of your votes to vote for other options.

not_allowed_role.title: Only certain roles allowed for this poll!
not_allowed_role.description: You cannot vote for this poll because you do not own any of the allowed roles.

already_closed.title: This poll is already closed!
already_closed.description: You cannot interact with this poll because it is already closed.

not_closed.title: This poll is not closed!
not_closed.description: The poll could not be reopened because it is not closed.

not_voted.title: Not voted for this option!
not_voted.description: You cannot remove your vote for this option because you have not voted for this option.

no_votes.title: No votes on this poll!
no_votes.description: You have not voted for any option on this poll.

invalid_poll.title: This is not a poll!
invalid_poll.description_input: The entered id is not a poll. Make sure you have entered the correct poll or message id.
invalid_poll.description_select: The selected message is not a poll. Make sure you have selected the correct poll message.

participants_not_available.title: Participants list not allowed!
participants_not_available.description: The participants list is not available for this poll.

vote_remove_not_allowed.title: Vote remove not allowed!
vote_remove_not_allowed.description: You cannot remove your vote for this poll because the remove votes is not allowed.

no_polls_found.title: No polls found!
no_polls_found.description: There are no polls found in this server that match the seached criteria.
